text:
Between ant 1.4.1 and 1.5, the type of the sigfile attribute was changed from a
String to a File.  This breaks calls to the signjar utility because it expects the
value to be the name of the file it puts in the META-INF directory.

Now that it is a file property, the value gets passed to the signjar utility as:
C:\Java\PlantApp\DaFIS which the utility rejects.

This property should be returned to a String as it does not represent a file on
the user's file system.
creator: jhkeller@ucdavis.edu

text:
Created attachment 2339
Proposed patch for SignJar.java
creator: jhkeller@ucdavis.edu

text: *** Bug 13590 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: conor@apache.org
conor@apache.org
text: Fixed - reverted sigfile to a string.
